General.Name: Shenzhen Yinghe Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Yinghe Technology Co., Ltd researches, develops, produces, and sells automation equipment in China. The company offers coating, roll press, slitting, film making, winding, and stacking machines; assembly lines and other products. It also offers e-cigarettes, pods, atomizers, and other e-cigarette accessories. The company serves battery production sectors. Shenzhen Yinghe Technology Co., Ltd was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Building 5, Software Industry Base, Shenzhen, China, 518061
